title: Initial F: Saint Michael and the Dragon
description: Initial F: Saint Michael and the Dragon; Unknown; Cambron, Belgium; about 1260 - 1270; Tempera colors on parchment; silver paint, tempera colors, and colored inks on parchment; Leaf: 8.9 x 8.9 cm (3 1/2 x 3 1/2 in.); Ms. Ludwig VI 5, leaf 22; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
